Description: Limestone ostracon, with remains of six lines of black-painted demotic text on one side.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Brian Muhs (Univ. of Chicago) and Amy Bahe (Cambridge Univ.).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393072) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393072)
